### [Background]{style="color: #1E354B"}

I am a pharmacist and epidemiologist specializing in cardiovascular medicine, especially hypertension. I obtained my PharmD in 2007 and MPH, with an emphasis in biostatistics and epidemiology in 2011, both from the University of Florida. I completed a Pharmacy Practice Residency at the NF/SG Veterans Affairs Hospital (2008) and a postdoctoral fellowship in Family Medicine at the University of Florida (2011). More recently, I completed a Certificate in Biomedical Informatics at the University of Florida (2019). I started my career at the [University of Colorado](https://pharmacy.cuanschutz.edu/) in 2011 and returned to the University of Florida in 2014, where I lead the [CVmedLab](https://cvmedlab.org/) and the [Center for Integrative Cardiovascular and Metabolic Disease](https://cicmd.center.ufl.edu/). I'm fortunate to work with an amazing group of colleagues and trainees in the [Department of Pharmaceutical Outcomes & Policy](https://pop.pharmacy.ufl.edu/).
:::
